revised_title: William Henry Bragg: A Pioneering Life in Science and Education
tldr: The obituary of William Henry Bragg, a prominent physicist and educator, highlights his journey from a shy and lonely student to a successful academic and scientific pioneer. Bragg's career included significant contributions to the field of physics, such as setting up the first X-ray tube in Australia and developing an interest in radioactivity. His dedication to teaching and scientific research made him a respected figure in the scientific community.
